meta.title: PacMan meets NEM
meta.description: An Open Source PacMan game using the NEM Blockchain featuring XEM Accounts, Sponsored Play, Pay per Play with XEM and NEM blockchain Mosaics.
meta.keywords: pacman, pacnem, multiplayer pacman, multiplayer game, blockchain, nem, nemblockchain, pacman nem, mosaics, namespaces, multi signature, multisig, sponsored play, pay per play, pay-per-play, crypto currencies, cryptocurrency, game advertisement, game sponsor, blockchain gaming

guest.welcome_paragraph_1_1: Welcome to the Pacnem Game. This game is a Free & Open Source Node.js Browser Game.
guest.welcome_paragraph_1_2: This project uses the nem Blockchain to authenticate Players as well as for Managing Game Sponsors and it stores the High Scores on the blockchain. This game will reflect how easy it is to use nem in your applications or games business layers and will emphasize the easy Setup for sponsoring and advertising Software in the Gaming industry using the nem Blockchain and Instant Payments.
guest.welcome_paragraph_2_1: Please enter a username and XEM address below and hit the 'Save' button to join Multiplayer Rooms for Pacnem.
guest.security_paragraph_1: Pacnem will never ask you to enter Sensitive information like your Password or your Private Key.
